Hints: Insert your map title. Always appears in browser tab
Add context (or leave blank)
Select position to display map title, or off
Appears in credits as "View data by..." (or leave blank)
Insert your email or web address to appear as link in Author Name (or leave blank)
Insert your code repo URL to appear as link in "View code..." (or leave blank)
Appears in credits as "...code by..." (or leave blank)
General format: UA-5488840-29
Display tightly-packed groups of markers as numbers, until zoomed in to view details.
Show intro text pop-up on startup (or leave blank)
Leave blank to auto-zoom to display all markers (or insert number between 1 [zoomed out] and 18 [zoomed in])
Leave blank to auto-center for all markers (or insert initial latitude)
Leave blank to auto-center for all markers (or insert initial longitude)
Display the search box (magnifying glass)
Select radius for results from Mapzen search
Select zoom level to display search results (larger = zoom in more)
Display the Show My Location button
Display the Zoom Controls
Display the credits
Show title at top of Points legend (or leave blank)
Display the Points legend
Insert a Font Awesome free and solid icon name (example: fa-bus) or any Material Design icon name (example: rowing) or leave blank
Display Table of all Points shown in current map
Height of table (as percentage of map; 40 percent is default)
Columns from Points sheet to display in Table (or leave blank)
Background color of table header (default is black). If desired, insert a comma and specify table text color (default is black).
Show title at top of Polyline legend (or leave blank)
Display Polyline legend
Insert a Font Awesome free and solid icon name (example: fa-bus) or any Material Design icon name (example: rowing) or leave blank
